name: 3 Days Till Thaw
description:
The story of the game is that you have been living off the wild in this ice cold area for a while now. But as it begins to thaw, you are attacked by strange creatures. Survive for 3 days(6 minutes) and  you will outlast the thaw.

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

TopDownTemplate -from Unreal engine

Retro Dreamscape -from twinmusicom.org

"Blizzard, Snow ambience", "Body impact, Fall on snow" -from zapsplat.com
